S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-183: Allow unnamed parameters in CREATE FUNCTION
This patch was contributed by James F. Adams (derby@xemaps.com)
The lookahead in the grammar of my previous patches did not work for some parameter types. I have reworked the lookahead to use syntactic lookahead similar to that used elsewhere in the grammar. I have included an additional test that would have failed with the previous patch. I have run the lang/functions.sql and lang/procedure.java using the various frameworks without error.
